name: Modern Cocktail
description: An amalgam of the "Modern" cocktail recipes in The Savoy Cocktail Book and a few other versions, this drink from Ted Kilpatrick of No. 9 Park in Boston is most distinguished by a cool, mentholated smokiness. Anise from the Pernod hits the nose, but mingles with the nuanced, peaty scotch. It's remarkable how summery a scotch cocktail can be.
recipeIngredient: 6 ounces Smith and Cross Jamaican rum
3 ounces Brugal Ron Anejo Dominican rum

recipeInstructions.text: For the Swedish Punsch: Combine all the ingredients. Allow to sit overnight. Strain and bottle.
For the cocktail: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add scotch, Swedish Punsch, Pernod, lemon juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.
